Billy Tarrant Tarrant Guitars Shearwater Tasmania Australia +61 409 176 761 Tarrantguitars@gmail.com Home Page: http://www.tarrantguitars.com.au Tarrant Guitars is a one man, boutique workshop owned and operated By Australian Guitar Maker Billy Tarrant.Billy creates a wide range of guitars in all different shapes and sizes including 6, 8 and 12 string acoustics, hollow neck weissenborns and ukulele's using the finest solid tonewood from local and international sources.Tarrant guitars also offers repair services on all stringed instruments. NEW WORKSHOP OPEN IN TASMANIA.(see www.tarrantguitars.com for more details.)
